entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
